API Reference

This page documents the key functions used within the Photometry Factory for RAPAS application, primarily located in pages/app.py and tools.py. These functions handle the core processing steps.

Astrometry

Note

Astrometry refinement using stdpipe happens within pages.app.detection_and_photometry.

Backend Interaction (Login/Config)

Note

Functions interacting with the Flask backend (login, register, save_config, get_config) are primarily handled within pages/login.py using requests to call the backend API endpoints defined in backend_dev.py.
